internationalizations.title: Cybersecurity & Pen-Testing
internationalizations.description: Completed the IBM Cybersecurity Professional certificate, gaining skills across the entire security lifecycle: from Fundamentals, Network Security, and Vulnerability Management to Cloud Security, Governance (GRC), and Incident Response. Also in hands-on training with PortSwigger's Web Security Academy.

internationalizations.title: Secure Cloud & Infrastructure
internationalizations.description: Mastering cloud-native security principles, core AWS services, and secure infrastructure through the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner re/Start program.

internationalizations.title: Secure Development & Automation
internationalizations.description: Formalizing advanced Python skills for secure application development, automation, and scripting, as validated by the Python Institute.
